content.rendered:
Happy New Year, family!

I hope you’re ready to Mix and Mingle because I am!

Thanks for your patience while I was working behind the scenes to finish a few projects.

Now It’s Time To Go!

It’s time to go—to countries around the world to experience delicious foods,
different cultures, and new vibes!

It’s time to go mix and mingle in cities around the US and around the world
for business networking and to connect with like-minded partners!

Mentoring 2026

And it’s time to go host workshops, and mentor, and share resources!

Every two weeks I’ll drop a short video and post here on MingleCity.com and in my newsletter
to let you know what’s going on, and when the next event is happening!

So stay tuned! We’re going to set it off in 2026!

~ Michael Baisden

Mingle City Mall

New Items & Gifts Coming Soon!
